long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A great, simple to use and FREE screen recording tool to help you with your productivity.

Azione allows you to record your current tab or desktop including the audio with the click of a button. Your recording can then be previewed before downloading it to use as you wish.
